alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 8:08PM EDT until May 21 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Meadville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Riceville, Adamsville, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Canadohta Lake, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg, Woodcock, Conneaut Lakeshore, Geneva and Hartstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
